sentences.en: Ballpark estimates indicate a price tag of $90 million a month.
sentences.cn: 大致的估计费用为每月9,000万美元。

sentences.en: Every article has a price tag on it.
He decided to tag on an extra paragraph at the end summarizing what he'd said.
sentences.cn: 他决定在结束部分再增加一段文字,总结他说话的内容.

sentences.en: His speed earned him the tag of ‘the runner’.
sentences.cn: 他的速度使他赢得了“飞人”的称号。

sentences.en: I can't say it justifies the price tag of £150.
I let him tag along because he had not been too well recently.
sentences.cn: 我让他跟着我，因为最近他身体不舒服。

sentences.en: In Britain, jazz is losing its elitist tag and gaining a much broader audience.
sentences.cn: 在英国，爵士乐不再是精英人物的专利，它正吸引着越来越多的听众。

sentences.en: Note the rising tone in the tag questions to confirm intonation.
sentences.cn: 注意标签问题里确定语调的声调.

sentences.en: One may tag this book traditional.
sentences.cn: 人们可以称这本书为传统作品.
请在你的行李上贴上标签了。

sentences.en: She peered at the tag to read the price.
She seems quite happy to tag along with them.
sentences.cn: 她好像很乐意跟着他们。

sentences.en: Sometimes, they've snapped off the security tag and just taken the one shoe.
sentences.cn: 有时候，他们把防盗标签扯掉，顺走那一只鞋。

sentences.en: Staff wore name tags and called inmates by their first names.
sentences.cn: 工作人员戴着姓名标签，对同僚直呼其名。
现在给这些瓶子贴上标签吧!

sentences.en: The price tag on the 34-room white Regency mansion is £17.5 million.
sentences.cn: 那栋有34个房间的摄政时期的白色官邸报价为1,750万英镑。

sentences.en: We started out with a little rag-tag team of 30 people.
sentences.cn: 我们最初只是一支由30人组成的散兵游勇的队伍。

sentences.en: You just search for an artist, song, album , or just a random search tag.
sentences.cn: 你只需要搜索艺术家、歌曲、相册、或者仅仅是一个随机搜索标签。

words.tran_cn: 标记的；示踪的；加标记的
薄铁片；垂下物；尾随者；加标签者
标签；名称；结束语；附属物
尾随，紧随；连接；起浑名；添饰

phrases.tran_cn: 狗牌；[计]卡箍标记；身分识别证
挂卡；吊牌；商品上使用保养说明书
美军官兵套在颈上的军籍号码牌
附加疑问句；反意疑问句
接杀：在一名外野手接住一个高飞球后在跑向下一垒前跑回，并用一只脚触击一垒

trans.tran_cn: 标签，附属物，口头禅，称呼
trans.tran_en: a small piece of paper, plastic etc attached to something to show what it is, who owns it, what it costs etc

trans.tran_cn: 给…加上标签，给…挂上标牌
trans.tran_en: to attach a tag to something

trans.tran_cn: 加标签于，附加，起诉，紧跟
trans.tran_en: to attach a tag to something
